title: Horse Face

nouns: The horse is one of two extant subspecies of Equus ferus.
Subspecies of Equus ferus, or the wild horse
Solid-hoofed herbivorous quadruped domesticated since prehistoric times
Horses are large ungulates, which have had a long relationship with human society.
A large animal with four legs of the Equus caballus species which people ride on or use for carrying things or pulling vehicles.

description:
The face of a horse, generally facing left. Depicted as a light or reddish-brown horse with a dark brown or black mane, and, on many platforms, a light-colored muzzle.

Not to be confused with the full-bodied üêé Horse or üèá Horse Racing, though their applications may overlap. Some vendors implement a similar design in ü¶Ñ Unicorn Face and ü¶ì Zebra.

WhatsApp’s horse is facing left, as Facebook’s previously was. Microsoft’s horse was previously looking straight ahead, as was Samsung’s, shown with a goofy, full-toothed grin. Softbank previously featured a full-bodied horse.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's horse face emoji features a noble equine head with a glossy finish, showcasing realistic textures and subtle highlights that emphasize its flowing mane. The gentle, wide eye and alert ears, rendered with Apple's characteristic smooth gradients, convey a sense of power, freedom, and natural beauty. It's a popular choice on Apple devices to represent horses, the countryside, or a feeling of wild spirit.
